Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Skin Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Skin Disorder/Pemphigoid/Benign Mucous Membrane Pemphigoid
Eye Diseases/Conjunctival Diseases/Pemphigoid, Benign Mucous Membrane
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Vesiculobullous/Pemphigoid, Benign Mucous Membrane
Record.Description: A chronic blistering disease with predilection for mucous membranes and less frequently the skin, and with a tendency to scarring. It is sometimes called ocular pemphigoid because of conjunctival mucous membrane involvement.
